description: Chelsea vs Fulham stats: Blues' Boxing Day record
title: Chelsea vs Fulham stats: Blues' Boxing Day record
title_page: Chelsea vs Fulham stats: Blues' Boxing Day record - BBC Sport
maintext:
In a run stretching back to 1984, Chelsea have won just two of their past 11 London derby matches played on Boxing Day (D5 L4).
However, they went on to win the title in both campaigns in which they did (3-2 v Fulham in 2005-06 and 2-0 v West Ham in 2014-15).
